title: Prayer
about: Prayer is the most essential activity that I must do Everyday. It helps me to keep calm and peaceful. It refresh my mind which helps me to focus on my other activities.

title: Watch Modules
about: Another important activity is Watching Module from Programming Hero Website. By watching this modules I learn new things everyday. Which helps me to boost my moral and self-confidence.

title: Coding Practice
about: After watching the modules, I always have to practice the codes by myself. Because, Practice makes a man perfect.

title: Read Documentation
about: To understand and see the insight of a new technologies or old ones is to read the documentation.

title: Watch Tutorial
about: The tutorials are for clearing the concepts that seems hard to me. By watching various tutorial the concepts become more clear to me.

title: Revision of Previous practices
about: I always spent some extra time on revision of the previous lessons. So that I do not forget them.

title: Analyze Software Development Life Cycle
about: To be a better software developer I should know the life cycle of a software. That is why I explore the Life Cycle of Software Development.

title: Read Articles
about: Articles are the news that helps me to know some new things about the technological world.

title: Read Blogs About Data Structure
about: To know about data structure, blogs are one of the most important and most available resources to me. Just search the required topic and read the blogs.

title: Read Blogs About Algorithms
about: Algorithm is one of the most important things to a developer. It helps to build the website more efficient with more activeness.

title: Summarize Daily Knowledge
about: This is the most important task for me at the end of the day. By summarizing everything, I can easily keeps track of the things that I learnt at that day.
